檢.definition: to check; to examine; to inspect; to exercise restraint

檢修.definition: to overhaul; to examine and fix (a motor); to service (a vehicle)

檢字法.definition: indexing system for Chinese characters in a dictionary

檢定.definition: a test; determination; to check up on; to examine; to assay

檢察.definition: to inspect; (law) to prosecute; to investigate

檢察官.definition: public prosecutor; public procurator (judicial officer whose job may involve both criminal investigation and public prosecution)

檢控方.definition: the prosecuting side (in a trial); the prosecution

檢束.definition: to regulate; to check and restrict

檢查.definition: inspection; to examine; to inspect; CL:次[ci4]

檢校.definition: to check; to verify; to proof-read

檢測.definition: to detect; to test; detection; sensing

檢票.definition: to inspect a ticket; to examine a ballot

檢索.definition: to retrieve (data); to look up; retrieval; search

檢舉.definition: to report (an offense to the authorities); to inform against sb

檢討.definition: to examine or inspect; self-criticism; review

檢警調.definition: (Tw) public prosecutors, the police, and the Investigation Bureau (abbr. for 檢察官、警察、調查局|检察官、警察、调查局[jian3 cha2 guan1 , jing3 cha2 , diao4 cha2 ju2])

檢錄.definition: roll-call (e.g. at athletics event); check the record

檢閱.definition: to inspect; to review (troops etc); military review

檢驗.definition: to inspect; to examine; to test

檢點.definition: to examine; to check; to keep a lookout; cautious; restrained (in speech or mannerisms)
